titleStmt.title: A declaration to the Iews for them to read over in which they may see that the Messiah is come, according to their own prophets and Gabriel the angel, and according their own number of time and years, out of Daniel 9 / by George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
